TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlParser extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods for creating a Web server control or interface from a string of markup that represents a persisted control or template.

span.span: Provides methods for creating a Web server control or interface from a string of markup that represents a persisted control or template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser 类提供了可以通过分析的字符串表示的控件或控件模板标记，创建发控件或获取的方法。The T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser class provides methods that can create a T:System.Web.UI.Control control or T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate interface by parsing a string of markup representing a control or control template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取页使用的控件的 HTML 标记类以及如何实例化中使用的控件类。The following code example shows how to get the HTML markup for a control on a page using the class and how to instantiate a control from it using the class. 该示例还演示如何显示从设计器的 Microsoft Windows 对话框。The example also shows how to display Microsoft Windows dialog boxes from a designer. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Creates a control from the specified markup.

span.span: Creates a control from the specified markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法访问表示使用设计器宿主的服务的 ASP.NET 网页上的注册指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过获得属性对象，或如果不可用，服务。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 如果分析器无法生成该控件，方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 HTML 标记文本创建的控件。The following code example shows how to create a control from HTML markup text. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法访问表示使用设计器宿主的服务的 ASP.NET 网页上的注册指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过获得属性对象，或如果不可用，服务。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 如果分析器无法生成该控件，方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 HTML 标记文本创建的控件。The following code example shows how to create a control from HTML markup text. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法访问表示使用设计器宿主的服务的 ASP.NET 网页上的注册指令的字符串。The method accesses the string representing the register directives on the ASP.NET Web page using the services of the designer host. 设计器宿主服务通过获得属性对象，或如果不可用，服务。Designer host services are acquired through the property of the object, or if that is not available, the service. 方法引发异常，如果分析器无法生成中的所有控件`controlText`参数。The method throws an exception if the parser cannot build the controls from the `controlText` parameter.
